items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: 13% reduced Charges per use
22% increased Duration

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. 3 to 4 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. After the immobilise expires, a debuff remains on the enemy for a duration, lowering their movement speed by an amount which lessens over time. The affected enemy will take increased damage from traps and mines until the debuff expires. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.
